tool.name: Produce a text summary of an SD-File
tool.description: using the sdreport provided with rxDock

param.name: fields
param.label: Fields to extract from the SD-file (comma-separated).
param.help: If not specified, the following fields will be used by default: TOTAL, INTER, INTRA, RESTR, VDW

param.name: nh
param.label: Print header line?
param.help: Print header line with the names of the specified fields.

param.name: norm
param.label: Normalize values?
param.help: Normalize score values by dividing by the number of ligand heavy atoms.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
This tool produces a tabular report from an SD file using the sdreport tool from the rxDock suite. See https://www.rxdock.org for more details about rxDock and associated programs.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs** An SD-file, together with names of fields to extract.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs** A tabular file listing molecules from the SD-file and the values for the specified fields.
